lead_paragraph: After years of near misses, Novak Djokovic finally conquered mount Roland Garros on Sunday to win the one trophy he craved like no other -- a maiden French Open title that elevated him into the pantheon of tennis greats.
snippet: After years of near misses, Novak Djokovic finally conquered mount Roland Garros on Sunday to win the one trophy he craved like no other -- a maiden French Open title that elevated him into the pantheon of tennis greats....

headline.main: Djokovic Conquers Roland Garros to Join Tennis Pantheon
headline.print_headline: Djokovic Conquers Roland Garros to Join Tennis Pantheon
